name: Garena Launcher ID
content:
files:
- garena_installer: http://cdn.gxx.garenanow.com/gxx/pc/installer/Garena-v2.0.exe
game:
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Garena/Garena/Garena.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing Garena Launcher
    executable: garena_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  MouseWarpOverride: enable
  dxvk: true
